document: A COMPARISON OF THE EFFICIENCY AND EFFECTIVENESS OF TWO MODELS FOR DETERMINING THE COST OF SPECIAL EDUCATION PROGRAMS by Kenneth L. Kienas Dissertation submitted to the Faculty of the Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University in partial fulfillment of the requirements for the degree of DOCTOR OF EDUCATION in Administration and Supervision of Special Education APPROVED: Richard G. Salmon, Co-Chairman Phili R. Jones, Co-Chairman John A. McLaughlin Shirley A Jones Shirley A. Underwood May, 1986 Blacksburg, Virginia
